Class TestEditation

  • public class TestEditation
extends java.lang.Object
    Frame for selection, modification and starting test.
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestEditation()
      Constructor will read all files ending with .xml prefix in the folder "tests" into the FilesInFolder.
